mods.note: June 9th 1925.My dear Mr. Hicks,I wish to send to you {free of charge & prepaid} twelve copies of Farrar's Life of Christ and ask you to have this book admitted as evidence in the Scopes case, and present a copy to each member of the jury.Yours truly,Henry Neil
